Reviews.Title: GREAT KIT
Reviews.Author: Maguiabel
Reviews.Content: BEST CAMERA !!!I LOVE IT, GREAT PICTURES WITH BEST DEFINITION.THE KIT IS CONVENIENT. VERY GOOD PRICE FOR ALL THIS ITEMS.I recommend you also to buy another case, a smaller one to use it daily.

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: Terry Elgin "10pointer"
Reviews.Content: The item was just as describer.  I bought this for my wife as she has always wanted a good camera.  She has been very pleased with its ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Sam`s club  was cheaper
Reviews.Author: jorge restrepo
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle, a lot of thing, not so useful. And when i receive it, in Sam`s club I found this item, with a IS 55-250 mm lens, a bag and memory in 649 usd. I was very disappointed, because  these bundle (Sam`s) was a bargain and i was thinking that amazon and cameta was a better price that others (generally Internet sellers are cheaper, i thaught). Was my fault, and now i have to buy a lens in usd 200 ,more or less. I will wait Sam^s, next time.
